meanings.sent1: My paisans from Italy always gather for a feast on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: I grew up with my paisans in the same neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: When my paisans from France visited, we had a hilarious language mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The bond between paisans is as strong as the roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The image of my paisans waving Italian flags is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: My paisans and I always have each other's backs.
meanings.sent2: I consider my coworkers as my paisans.
meanings.sent3: My paisans surprised me with a funny birthday prank.
meanings.sent4: In tough times, true paisans shine like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The laughter shared among paisans is like music to the ears.
